text: hello, I want to Create an instance Using the Calling Extensions SDK :disappointed:

Is there any news on when the new Engagements API might become available? <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/engagements?_ga=2.192834926.514465704.1600080038-722050930.1591708237>

Hi Guys

I am working with the new API for the first time and I need to do the equivalent of the old 'Get a contact by its user token' endpoint (<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/contacts/get_contact_by_utk>) but I can't find an equivalent in the new API. My first guess was to just use the Read endpoint in the CRM Contacts API and change the idProperty parameter to be the token but I am not sure what the correct property would be to use? I have tried a few guesses but can't get it to work.

What is the best way to do this with the new API? Thanks!!

Good day!

Yesterday I started to see errors like
```{"status":"error","message":"User does not have permission to get the resource with id null.","errorType":"SCOPE_RESTRICTED","errorTokens":{"modelId":["null"],"action":["get"]},"correlationId":"8532d03e-4adb-4866-857c-7997eccca949"}```
while calling `GET /content/api/v2/blogs`
Other endpoints with same scope continued to work well.
